DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare onset duration initial dose medication give three different epidural ( conventional epidural , combine spinal epidural dural puncture epidural ) technique labor pain relief . The secondary objective study compare fetal effect three epidural labor analgesia technique .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Epidural Labor Pain Relief Techniques Maternal Fetal Outcomes
DOC.criteria: 1 . Nulliparous ( first baby ) parturient 2 . Singleton , vertex gestation term ( 3742 week ) 3 . Less 5 cm dilation 4 . Desires epidural technique labor analgesia 1 . Current historical evidence clinically significant disease condition , include disease pregnancy ( i.e preeclampsia , gestational diabetes ) 2 . Any contraindication administration epidural technique 3 . History hypersensitivity idiosyncratic reaction local anesthetic opioid medication 4 . Current historical evidence disease may result risk cesarean delivery . 5 . Evidence anticipate fetal anomaly
